page.title: 04FISH FARMING
page.content: The{North East Fife Fishfarm}in{Ceres was started in{1977}and was selling fish in{1978.}The business was open some years but has temporarily closed. The farm is situated in a field behind the owners garden.There are{5 ponds each holding{5500 fish}also{8 tanks for young fish.The fish bred were {Rainbow Trout}because these fish survive in cold temperature and also grow faster than{Brown Trout.}It takes {18 months}for the fish to mature.The fish were sold to various{hotels, {angling clubs,shops and farm gate {customers.}Problems found in running the farm were lack of sufficient markets and thieves.The owner is thinking of opening again and has 200 trout from original farming.{However {Ceres is not ideal for fish farming {because there is no gravity water.
